q1.question: Can I try before I buy?
q1.answer: Yes! Our free demo lets you create one patient with up to 5 tests and generate PDF reports. No credit card required.

q2.question: Is my data secure?
q2.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption, and your data is stored securely on trusted cloud infrastructure.

q3.question: Can I work offline?
q3.answer: Yes, with our Professional and Enterprise plans, you can work completely offline. Data syncs automatically when you reconnect.

q4.question: What languages are supported?
q4.answer: LapManagerPro supports English, Arabic (with RTL), French, and Spanish.

q5.question: Can I customize the PDF reports?
q5.answer: Yes! You can add your laboratory logo, customize headers and footers, and even add e-signatures to your reports.

q6.question: How do I get support?
q6.answer: We offer email support for all plans, with priority support for Professional users.
